name: April Hampton
review: You probably wouldn't be plugging in any pair of over ear headphones every night maybe once a week (even if you do a fair amount of listening). As soon as you're not plugging them in every night you don't have a routine so the longer between charges the better.

name: Sampson Dickson
review: The idea is very cool, but I just don't see the use case for these. The main times I would wear bigger headphones like this is either while working (inside), at an airport (inside), or on a plane (inside). Maybe I'm unique, but if I'm out and about, I'm definitely wearing earbuds, not big, bulky on ear cans.

name: Rowena Goff
review: First I'll start with what I like about these. The battery life is INCREDIBLE. I wear them for a 10 hour shift and the battery life is still at 65% at the end of my shift. The noise cancellation is amazing as well. The sound quality I feel could be better for $200, but overall I'm satisfied.

name: Gamble Robbins
review: Bought these to replace an older pair I have had for a few years now. They sound great. I find they are not quiet as loud as my previous solos but the sound quality is the same. Verified they are authentic. Serial number on the right side can be registered with beats. All contents were included and box was sealed. Definitely legit!! Great purchase.

name: Holden Anderson
review: I was alittle worried buying these headphones after reading the comments. After receiving them I am happy I bought them. They connected to my android devices no problem. They are not 100 percent noise canceling but they are still great for home use.

name: Casandra Mcneil
review: This. We (those of us who still routinely make phone calls) need this. Voice call quality will make or break a pair of headphones for me, wired or wireless.
